mdRecord.dcterms:description: A blessing, with response. Initials and a date [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Peace I leave with you | my peace I give to you. | Not as the world gives do I give to you | -- John 14:27 | Gee thanks | BP 4/14
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Blessing and cursing
Peace
